paint.fiji.tracks

Class TrackAttributes

  • java.lang.Object
    • paint.fiji.tracks.TrackAttributes

  • public final class TrackAttributes
extends Object
    Immutable representation of a single trackâ€™s quantitative attributes.

    Each instance encapsulates per-track motion descriptors such as total distance traveled, diffusion coefficients, confinement ratio, and net displacement. Primarily used for summarizing TrackMate analysis results in higher-level PAINT workflows.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TrackAttributes

        public TrackAttributes(int numberOfSpotsInTracks,
                       double totalDistance,
                       double diffusionCoeff,
                       double diffusionCoeffExt,
                       double confinementRatio,
                       double displacement)
        Constructs a TrackAttributes instance with all motion-related metrics.
        Parameters:
        numberOfSpotsInTracks - the number of spots (or detections) in the track
        totalDistance - the total distance traveled by the track
        diffusionCoeff - the diffusion coefficient calculated from the mean squared displacement relative to the first spot
        diffusionCoeffExt - the extended diffusion coefficient based on step-wise mean squared displacement
        confinementRatio - the ratio of net displacement to total distance traveled
        displacement - the net displacement between the first and last spot in the track

      • TrackAttributes

        public TrackAttributes()
        Constructs a default TrackAttributes instance with:
        • numberOfSpotsInTracks = 0
        • All numeric fields initialized to Double.NaN

        Useful for representing tracks with insufficient data points or failed computations.
